name: nginx-ingress
description: Ingress controller for Kubernetes using NGINX as a reverse proxy and load balancer
values:
## nginx configuration
## Ref: https://github.com/kubernetes/ingress-nginx/blob/main/charts/ingress-nginx/values.yaml
controller:
  image:
    registry: k8s.gcr.io
    image: ingress-nginx/controller
    tag: "v1.10.1"
  replicaCount: 1
  service:
    type: LoadBalancer
    port: 80
    targetPorts:
      http: 80
      https: 443
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 100m
      memory: 90Mi
    requests:
      cpu: 100m
      memory: 90Mi

defaultBackend:
  enabled: false

prometheus:
  enabled: false
